name: Avoid Cross-Client Database Access using Open SQL statements with CLIENT SPECIFIED/USING CLIENT addition
Avoid disabling authentication mode messages when using MSMQ transport security
Avoid message security without authentication for an anonymous client
PermitAll or user role should be specified to access URL(s) of the application
Avoid using Spring Security in combination with Spring Framework 5.0.5
Always enable authorization checks at function level for functions called on by APIs based with Spring Application
Always enable authorization checks at function level for functions called on by APIs based with Spring Application
